name: Mark of Invasion
description: At the start of battle, enemy units appear on each floor. 3 ATK/1 HP

name: Mark of Invasion B
description: At the start of battle, enemy units appear on each floor. B ATK/B HP

name: Mark of Invasion C
description: At the start of battle, enemy units appear on each floor. C ATK/C HP

name: Heaven's Seal A
description: Non-boss enemy units restore A health when they move up a floor.

name: Heaven's Seal B
description: Non-boss enemy units restore B health when they move up a floor.

name: Tough as Nails B
description: Enemy units enter with Titanskin B.

name: Thorn Guard A
description: A Penitent Prayerstone is spawned on each floor. A HP/A Spikes

name: Thorn Guard
description: A Penitent Prayerstone is spawned on each floor. 200 HP/6 Spikes

name: Stone of the Undying A
description: The front non-boss enemy in each wave gets Reanimate A.

name: Stone of the Undying B
description: The front non-boss enemy in each wave gets Reanimate B.
